title: Ep139: Kids or Swallow? Feat Weezy's Mom
itunes:title: Ep139: Kids or Swallow? Feat Weezy's Mom
description:
On this week's episode, Weezy and Mandii are joined by Weezy's mom once again. The ladies begin the conversation with debating what are girlfriend tasks and what is doing "too much" with someone you are just having sex with. Also find out more about Weezy's upbringing and why her mom thinks she isn't ready for kids. Hilarity instills and the trio dip in and out of conversations regarding sex, dating and Weezy and Mandii's relationship and hoe-ventures as teenagers. Share your thoughts on this week's episode by Tweeting @whoreiblepod and using the hashtag #whoreibledecisions. Also follow us on Instagram @whoreible_decisions This week's episode is brought to you by: Adam & Eve- Get 50% almost any one item + 6 free gifts and free shipping. Use Promocode WD50 at checkout.
